author: 00b0b.
content: Is there any date set for shutting Goerli down?

author: jgm
content: It's in LTS now, and likely to be unsupported come 1 Jan. But there is always someone who wants to keep chains running.

author: philngo
content: There's nothing coordinated amongst client teams yet who are running lots of validators to keep the chain finalizing

author: 00b0b.
content: So it is expected to continue to be live for awhile (even if it's in a degraded state)?

author: jgm
content: Sure, but once they exit then whomever is left may want to keep it up.

author: jgm
content: "Expected" is too strong a word.  It's a possibility, in the short term, although eventually clients will drop support for it.  And there aren't many good reasons to keep it going rather than migrate to holesky (for validators) or sepolia (for dapps) outside of the fact that there is so much already deployed on it.
